Research Tips and Strategies

  • About

About this site

This site is a exploratory and very much a work in progress! I'm hoping it becomes a place to share modular, practical, and well-designed approaches to teaching research skills and writing techniques. The focus is on research at UCLA, but many of these tips will be useful for anyone taking on a research project.

Hope you find the site useful!

Development notes

This site is built in Jekyll hosted on github and built on the excellent foundation provided by the Long Haul jekyll theme.

Want to collaborate? Me too!
